document.full_text: an ohio air traffic controller and his manager have been suspended after the controller was found to be watching a movie while on duty, the federal aviation administration said in a statement late on monday.
document.title: air traffic controller watched movie while on duty: faa
lines_and_colors: an ohio air traffic controller and his manager have been suspended after the controller was found to be watching a movie while on duty, the federal aviation administration said in a statement late on monday.
